speech: Sheath Blight chawal ka ek fungal disease hai jo Rhizoctonia solani fungus ki wajah se hota hai.
Ye disease zyadatar humid aur warm conditions mein hota hai aur plant ki growth ko severely affect karta hai.
Is disease ke symptoms mein lower leaves ke girdle area mein water-soaked lesions hoti hain jo gradually brown aur dry patches mein badal jati hain.
Severe cases mein poora plant weak ho jata hai aur grain filling ka process impact hota hai, jis se yield kam hoti hai.
Is disease ko manage karne ke liye crop rotation aur resistant rice varieties ko adopt karna zaroori hai.
Proper spacing aur water management bhi Sheath Blight ko control karne mein madadgar hota hai.
Fungicides jese ki carbendazim ya propiconazole ka timely application disease ko manage kar sakta hai.
